issue.title: Forward declarations of entities need also in entries

discussion.p: There are forward declarations of entities from <spanstream> and <syncstream> in <iosfwd> so their feature macros should be added to that header too. Proposed change: Add <iosfwd> to the "also in" entries for `__cpp_lib_char8_t`, `__cpp_lib_spanstream`, and `__cpp_lib_syncbuf`.
discussion.note: Kona 2025-11-04; approved by LWG. Status changed: New → Immediate.

blockquote.pre: #define __cpp_lib_char8_t 201907L // freestanding, also in <atomic>, <filesystem>, <iosfwd>, <istream>, <limits>, <locale>, <ostream>, <string>, // <string_view> […] #define __cpp_lib_spanstream 202106L // also in <iosfwd>, <spanstream> […] #define __cpp_lib_syncbuf 201803L // also in <iosfwd>, <syncstream>
